lead_paragraph: Months after the installation by Donald Trump of 20-foot-tall letters spelling out his last name on the side of one of the city's tallest skyscrapers, Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel is proposing an ordinance that would make sure nobody else can do the same.

headline.main: Emanuel Wants No More Signs as Large as Trump's
headline.print_headline: Emanuel Wants No More Signs as Large as Trump's
